extendedInfo.description: Auto Pick-Up will answer incoming phone calls automatically and put your phone in speaker mode if needed.If you are driving your car, riding your bike, you donât need to use your hands to pick up the phone anymore. Auto Pick-Up will do it for you simple and easy. Automatically answers your calls when you are on the go.Works with and without Bluetooth headset.*** Feature ***- Adjustable Answer timeout- Auto Activate speakerphone if needed- Option to select what calls has to be answered- And much more...Please feel free to send your suggestions to info@egpsapp.com
